import pandas as pd
pd.set_option('display.max_colwidth', None)
dataset = pd.read_csv('../input/uruguayan-media-historical-tweets/full_info.csv')
dataset.sample(5)
source.d6af9bab:
from ast import literal_eval
from collections import Counter
from operator import itemgetter
source.5b0282ce:
personas = sample['PersonasStanza'].apply(lambda x: list(set(literal_eval(x)))).sum()
organizaciones = sample['OrganizacionesStanza'].apply(lambda x: list(set(literal_eval(x)))).sum()
localidades = sample['LocalidadesStanza'].apply(lambda x: list(set(literal_eval(x)))).sum()

principales_personas       = list(map(itemgetter(0), Counter(personas).most_common(5)))
principales_organizaciones = list(map(itemgetter(0), Counter(organizaciones).most_common(5)))
principales_localidades    = list(map(itemgetter(0), Counter(localidades).most_common(5)))

pd.DataFrame({"Principales Personas": principales_personas, "Principales Organizaciones": principales_organizaciones, "Principales Localidades": principales_localidades})
